etymology.description: 曲 + 辰 ('field'); top unrelated to 曲; earlier form showed two hands on either side of a bundle 田, a farmer bringing goods to market from the field 辰.
etymology.interpretation: Depicts produce from the fields being handled and brought to market, emphasizing the activity and setting of agriculture. Later scribal evolution made the top resemble 曲, though that resemblance is accidental; the overall sense points to farming and farm work.
etymology.simplification: Traditional 農 was abbreviated to 农 by collapsing the multi-part ideogram into a compact form, primarily for stroke reduction and ease of writing; no phonetic element was introduced.

examples.chinese: 农业发展很快(農業發展很快)。
很多农民在秋天收割(很多農民在秋天收割)。
examples.pinyin: hěn duō nóngmín zài qiūtiān shōugē.

examples.chinese: 他在农田里工作(他在農田裡工作)。
